dublinCore.dc:title: HR 5441 ENR: To amend the Federal charter of the Veterans of Foreign Wars of the United States to reflect the service of women in the Armed Forces of the United States.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.congress: One Hundred Thirteenth Congress of the United States of America
form.enrolled-dateline: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Friday, the third day of January, two thousand and fourteen
form.official-title: To amend the Federal charter of the Veterans of Foreign Wars of the United States to reflect the service of women in the Armed Forces of the United States.

section.header: Reflection of service of women in the Armed Forces in the Federal charter of the Veterans of Foreign Wars of the United States

subsection.text: Section 230101(a) of title 36, United States Code, is amended by striking men and inserting veterans.
Section 230102(3) of such title is amended by striking widows and inserting surviving spouses.

attestation-group.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.
